message.content: {"id": "6656", "title": "Bug 6656 - Close button moves down when view resized smaller", "description": "", "OB": "When resizing the view like the Navigator on Linux with build 20011127 (not reproducible on build 20011116 on Nt2000), the close button is observed to move below the label.", "EB": "When resizing the view like the Navigator on Linux with build 20011127 (not reproducible on build 20011116 on Nt2000), the close button should remain in its original position and not move below the label.", "SR": "Ensure that the close button in the Navigator view on Linux with build 20011127 (not reproducible on build 20011116 on Nt2000) remains in its original position and does not move below the label when the view is resized smaller."}
